Desc.entry: A social enterprise which aims to: develop renewable energy products in and around Sheffield to aid sustainable development; operate renewable energy projects and sell renewable energy, so helping to enhance the sustainability and resilience of local communities and contribute to the conservation, protection and improvement of the environment; promote the prudent use of resources, efficient energy use and environmentally aware attitudes and behaviours by advancing the education and awareness of the community through outreach, communications and by direct involvement in society; contribute to achieving local targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions and increase renewable energy provision. Registered as an Industrial and Provident Society no. 30736R

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Please contact for details or see website
